name: facenet
description: node-facenet is a TensorFlow backed FaceNet implementation for Node.js.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:python3 && npm run clean:models
scripts.dist: npm run clean:dist && tsc && shx cp src/python3/*.py dist/src/python3/
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:py
scripts.lint:ts: tslint --project tsconfig.json --type-check && npm run clean:dist && tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:py: . python3/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH='src/:python3/facenet/src/' pylint src/python3/*.py && npm run lint:flake8 && npm run lint:mypy
scripts.postinstall: npm run venv && npm run postinstall:facenet && npm run postinstall:models
scripts.postinstall:facenet: cd python3 && if [ -d facenet ]; then (cd facenet && git pull); else git clone https://github.com/davidsandberg/facenet.git; fi && cd -
scripts.postinstall:models: set -e && if [ ! -d models ]; then mkdir models; fi && cd models && if [ ! -f model.tar.bz2 ]; then curl --location --output model.tar.bz2.tmp https://github.com/zixia/node-facenet/releases/download/v0.1.9/model-20170512.tar.bz2; mv model.tar.bz2.tmp model.tar.bz2; fi && tar jxvf model.tar.bz2 && cd -
scripts.start: echo `npm run demo` to show a demo.
scripts.test: npm run test:py && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:npm: cross-env-shell TMPDIR=/tmp/npm-package-test.$$ 'npm pack && mkdir $TMPDIR && mv *-*.*.*.tgz $TMPDIR && cp tests/fixtures/facenet-smoke-testing.js $TMPDIR && cd $TMPDIR && npm init -y && npm i *-*.*.*.tgz && node facenet-smoke-testing.js'
scripts.venv: python3 -m venv python3 && . python3/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt

author: Huan LI <zixia@zixia.net>
